content: What steps should I take to use -Zbuild-std with stage1 compiler? This used to "just work", but this is no longer the case since vendoring changes from https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/8834.

Previously I was doing something along the lines of:

./x.py build
rustup toolchain link stage1 build/x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1
cargo +stage1 -Zbuild-std run --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
